name: TotalColectomy
title: Total Colectomy
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent total colectomy procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a total colectomy, as an open or laparoscopic procedure. This is a grouping of CPT, SNOMED CT and ICD-10-PCS codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes partial colectomies.)
